title: Fix AuthProvider wrapper to resolve useAuth context error

requirements.summary: Wrap App component with AuthProvider in main.tsx to make authentication context available globally
acceptanceCriteria: The AuthProvider from frontend/src/hooks/useAuthContext.tsx wraps the entire app at the root level in frontend/src/main.tsx
The component hierarchy ensures AuthProvider wraps both QueryClientProvider and RouterProvider
The 'useAuth must be used within an AuthProvider' error no longer occurs
Registration and Login pages can successfully access the authentication context via the useAuth hook
The authentication state persists across navigation and page refreshes

file_operations.description: Import AuthProvider from frontend/src/hooks/useAuthContext.tsx and restructure the component hierarchy so that AuthProvider wraps the QueryClientProvider and App component (which contains RouterProvider). The hierarchy should be: InternetIdentityProvider > AuthProvider > QueryClientProvider > App. This ensures the authentication context from useAuthContext is available to all components including Registration and Login pages that use the useAuth hook.
